document_data.name: ''Basher''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Basher''''' was the favorite enchanted [[lute]] that belonged to an adventuring [[bard]] [[Calliope]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: '''Basher''' traveled the world with its owner, playing musing and smiting foes from [[Chult]] to the [[Spine of the World]]. It was believed that this lute played and sounded better with age.
document_data.Powers: Apart from rare magic that improved the sound of the lute with age, ''Basher'' possessed the terrible power that allowed the used to cast the ''[[power word, kill]]'' spell.
